Event.name: Employment_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Employee</fen> and <fen>Employer</fen> enter into an employment relation, wherein the <fen>Employee</fen> remains employed for some <fen>Duration</fen> of time, and finally the relationship ends either by the <fen>Employee</fen> leaving the job or the <fen>Employer</fen> letting go (or firing) the <fen>Employee</fen>. To each of these events there are concomitants, such as agreeing to/signing a contract for entering employment, compensation and performance of a service for the employment period itself, and severance for the dissolution of the relationship. There are several other events involved, including preparatory actions on the part of the <fen>Employer</fen> (posting the <fen>Position</fen>), the prospective <fen>Employee</fen>'s part (looking for a job), or both (job interviews). In addition, there is the possibility of change in the relationship of <fen>Employer</fen> and <fen>Employee</fen> during the employment period, such as a change in <fen>Position</fen> (e.g. promotion, demotion) and a change in <fen>Compensation</fen> (e.g. raise, paycut).</def-root>

Arg.name: Compensation
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Compensation</fen> is the payment that the <fen>Employee</fen> receives for performing a <fen>Task</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Employee
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who is obligated to perform some <fen>Task</fen> in order to receive <fen>Compensation</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Empee">I</fex> was just <t>hired</t> yesterday!</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Employer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person (or institution) that gives <fen>Compensation</fen> to an <fen>Employee</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Position
Arg.definition: <def-root>The label given to a particular type of employment. <ex>Look, I wasn't <t>hired</t> <fex name="Position">as your waitress</fex>!</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Task
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Task identifies the action that the <fen>Employee</fen> is obligated to do for the <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex>I was <t>hired</t> <fex name="Task">just to empty the trash cans</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Field
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Field</fen> in which one works. <ex>He has been <t>working</t> <fex name="Field">in finance</fex> for years.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the amount of time for which the <fen>Employee</fen> continues in employ.</def-root>
